name: tvOS 15.5
available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher, Antonio Zekic (@antoniozekic), and John Aakerblom (@jaakerblom)

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to enable iCloud Photos without authentication
advisories.description: An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with system privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds access issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: actae0n of Blacksun Hackers Club working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

cves.credit: chenyuwang (@mzzzz__) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Peter Nguyễn Vũ Hoàng (@peternguyen14) of STAR Labs (@starlabs_sg)

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Ned Williamson of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An attacker that has already achieved kernel code execution may be able to bypass kernel memory mitigations
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious attacker with arbitrary read and write capability may be able to bypass Pointer Authentication
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions on third-party applications.

cves.credit: Arsenii Kostromin (0x3c3e), Jonathan Bar Or of Microsoft

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Max Shavrick (@_mxms) of the Google Security Team

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Max Shavrick (@_mxms) of the Google Security Team

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Max Shavrick (@_mxms) of the Google Security Team

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Max Shavrick (@_mxms) of the Google Security Team, Zubair Ashraf of Crowdstrike

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious app may be able to bypass signature validation
advisories.description: A certificate parsing issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Chijin Zhou of ShuiMuYuLin Ltd and Tsinghua wingtecher lab
Chijin Zhou of ShuiMuYuLin Ltd and Tsinghua wingtecher lab

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Dongzhuo Zhao working with ADLab of Venustech

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may disclose restricted memory
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.
